name: summer top "margarita"
sizes_available: s (m) l (xl) xxl - eu size chart
notes:
sizes: s ( m ) l (xl) xxl 

approximate chest circumference (cm)
82-88 cm ( 90-96 cm)  98-105cm (106-113 cm)  114-120 cm

materials: approximate amount of yarn necessary:  
(important: if the top is planned to be longer/shorter as shown in the table below, then the necessary amount of yarn can change.)

drops paris  (100% cotton  ; 50g/75m) 
dmc amie.   (94% cotton/6% polyamide ; 50g/115m)
lang yarns lino  (100%  linen ; 50g/110m)
scheepjes cahlista (100% cotton ; 50g/85m)
or any other yarn with similar characteristics 
 
200 (250) 300 (350) 400 g 

my original yarn was in a cone (code 1400550) from shop woolyyarn.com

stich markers : 4 

needles: circular needles nr. 5  - i recommend using cord cable
 lengths 40 cm and  80/100 cm

knitting tension: 
gauge : 16 stitches x 24 rows (10x10 cm) - after wet blocking (washing, drying on flat surface, shaping) 
the sample is knitted in stockinette stitch (knit 1 row, purl 1 row)

the piece is worked top down with shoulder raglan technique. positive ease of the top approx. 6-8 cm.
